verses.verse: How long, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh? Will you forget <S%H7911><s%> me forever? <S%H5331><s%> How long will you hide <S%H5641><s%> your face from me? <S%H6440><s%>

How long shall I take <S%H7896><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> in my soul, <S%H5315><s%> having sorrow <S%H3015><s%> in my heart <S%H3824><s%> every day? <S%H3119><s%> How long shall my enemy <S%H341><s%> triumph over me? <S%H7311><s%>
Behold, <S%H5027><s%> and answer <S%H6030><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, my God. <S%H430><s%> Give light <S%H215><s%> to my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> lest I sleep <S%H3462><s%> in death; <S%H4194><s%>
Lest my enemy <S%H341><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "I have prevailed <S%H3201><s%> against him; <S%H6862><s%>" Lest my adversaries rejoice <S%H1523><s%> when I fall. <S%H4131><s%>
But I trust <S%H982><s%> in your loving kindness. <S%H2617><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> rejoices <S%H1523><s%> in your salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
I will sing <S%H7891><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> because he has been good to me. <S%H1580><s%>
